Weekly activities

From Guild Wars Wiki
Jump to navigationJump to search
Note: Weekly bonuses and Nicholas the Traveler requests change at 15:00 UTC on Mondays. If your browser does not update the available activities, you can refresh the list.
Week starting PvE bonus PvP bonus Nicholas item Nicholas location Nicholas map
10 November 2025 Northern Support Codex Arena Dessicated Hydra Claws (2x) The Scar Map
17 November 2025 Zaishen Mission Alliance Battle Frigid Hearts (3x) Spearhead Peak Map
24 November 2025 Pantheon Random Arenas Celestial Essences (3x) Nahpui Quarter (explorable area) Map
1 December 2025 Faction Support Guild Versus Guild Phantom Residue (1x) Lornar's Pass Map
8 December 2025 Zaishen Vanquishing Competitive Mission Drake Kabob (1x) Issnur Isles Map
15 December 2025 Extra Luck Heroes' Ascent Amber Chunks (3x) Ferndale Map
22 December 2025 Elonian Support Codex Arena Glowing Hearts (2x) Stingray Strand Map
29 December 2025 Zaishen Bounty Alliance Battle Saurian Bones (5x) Riven Earth Map
5 January 2026 Factions Elite Random Arenas Behemoth Hides (2x) Wilderness of Bahdza Map
12 January 2026 Northern Support Guild Versus Guild Luminous Stone (1x) Crystal Overlook Map
19 January 2026 Zaishen Mission Competitive Mission Intricate Grawl Necklaces (3x) Witman's Folly Map
26 January 2026 Pantheon Heroes' Ascent Jadeite Shards (3x) Shadow's Passage Map

Core • Prophecies • Factions • Nightfall • Eye of the North • Beyond
  • by Logs: Primary • Festival
  • by Availability: Daily • Weekly
  • by Parameters: Mini-mission • Repeatable • Solo
  • by Difficulty: Master difficulty • Hard Mode only

  • by Misc: Useful for farming • Removed quests
